articles.description: Golden State Warriors owner Joe Lacob retains interest in the Oakland Athletics if they were for sale, noting that the Las Vegas-bound A’s aren’t being shopped.
articles.content: In a perfect world for Oakland Athletics fans, John Fishers relocation plan would collapse and he would sell the As to a group committed to keeping them in the Bay Area.Perhaps a group involving Joe … [+2361 chars]
